page.title: 13MEIR PARK DEVELOPMENT
page.content: Meir Park is a housing estate and it was started on the aerodrome in 1972. There are about 900 houses built and they are planning to build about 600 more houses.There are a few companies building such as Lowe Homes,Tarmac and BarrattÂ£s.One way of building is called self building.This includes signing a contract which makes you work several hours a week for 18 months.If you donÂ£t complete your hours of work in 18 months you are fined.Meir Park also has 4 factories called Staffordshire Potteries,Edwards and Jones,J.R Hill, Harrison Mayer Ramsden and a Telecom depot.These buildings are situated on the Northern side of Meir Park.There is also a public playing field alongside the housing estate.The playing fields will partly disappear because the estate is growing but there will always be some grass left to play and walk on.
